verbs.description: [V: imagine] [ARG1: dragons fan explains how dan reynolds loveloud festival inspired him to come out imagine dragons frontman dan reynolds was the subject of believer a powerful documentary released by hbo this year that followed him through the process of launching his loveloud festival in utah in hopes of advocating and fundraising for lgbtq youth director hbo utah cameron esposito loveloud don argott dan reynolds billboard loveloud festival eric michels]
